title: Ability Scores
markdown:
# Ability Scores

Your character has six ability scores: Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.

These scores represent your character's most basic attributes and affect many aspects of play.
plainText: Ability Scores. Your character has six ability scores: Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.
